text: taxes feel like trying to debug code without any comments - good luck figuring out why past-you did something!
sometimes i swear our audit's just someone hitting ctrl+f on random receipts just to test if we're paying attention 🙃
debugging project coding issues randomly pops up when i'm binge-watching something at home... brain never really switches off!
feels like you're expected to have your life fully sorted out
engineering’s got its share too - biased assumptions abound
even top projects don't shield you from bias sometimes
